column4: MOTHERFUCKER!! I GET PISSED FUCK OFF!!! I WANT WATCH PORNO AND THIS IDIOT TOTEM SAYS "Windows Media Speech Decoder" not found!!!!
why the fuck my porno dont work?
i knew i should never have installed this hippie communist shit
fix your attitude if you want help.
9.04 is a totally new distribution. it will take time to get used to it. some things change, some things don't.
we don't complain about porno not working, you do. please, go chill out for awhile and, uhm, find some pictures. then come back later.
pictures is so 1990, i want movies
well, you're still going to have to fix your attitude to get the help that you need from here, regardless.
have you tried a different media player?
have you tried any other players besides totem? like mplayer, xine or vlc?
also flash dont always work in firefox
well, sometimes totem isn't the best application for the job, that's why there are alternatives in order to solve the problem.
someone else was having a problem with flash not working either....
have you checked the ubuntu bug reporter to see if anyone else has posted a fix?
well, the best place to search would be at http://bugs.launchpad.net and you could also try http://ubuntuforums.org as well, as both of those sites compliment this official IRC channel.
